column5: Very calm, quiet, and relaxing environment. Gated entry to the Condo with a pool view from the balcony. There is a TV upstairs and downstairs. Sectional couch with a small kitchen table in the living room/kitchen. Wifi with netflix and Hulu available. Cable on both tvs. Easy highway access, everything you need within minutes. Airport is 10 min away and downtown is 15 min away.
